question:
Question: Navigation Instruction given at initial position: [go straight and move to the top of the view. take slowly left and turn around the top of the building. near by the building and in front of advertisements on the board. go straight and move to the bridge and turn right into the building. more than the advertisements in the building. go straight and move to cross the lake and nearby the building blocks. turn around the building and turn right to the top of the view. move upwards and turn around the building.]. You are moving according to a series of movement instructions. What are you doing now?  
choose:  
A. I go across the water.  
B. I turn right at the building.  
C. I fly over buildings.  
D. I go to the chair between the buildings.  
E. I turn back.

textgrad_result.init_answer: Option: A; Reason: The sequence of images shows a progression from an initial position near a fountain towards a view that includes water, indicating movement across the water as part of the navigation instructions.
textgrad_result.evaluation:
Location: [(20, 30)]
Option: A
Reason: From 20s to 30s, the video shows the view of crossing the lake. So I go across the water.
textgrad_result.final_answer: Option: A; Reason: The sequence of images shows a progression from an initial position near a fountain towards a view that includes water, indicating movement across the water as part of the navigation instructions.
